quests.title: Echoes of the Fallen
quests.summary: Find remnants of the past and confront the myths of the dragon's fall.
steps: Collect the shards of ancient weapons.
Face the specter of the worldbreaker.
quests.success_outcome: You restore a piece of history, gaining power and knowledge.
quests.failure_outcome: You unleash horrors that haunt your mind.

quests.title: Second Chances
quests.summary: Assist survivors in rebuilding their shattered lives.
quests.success_outcome: The village thrives and rewards you kindly.
quests.failure_outcome: The village suffers, and trust diminishes.

quests.title: Whispers of Betrayal
quests.summary: Unravel hidden secrets among companions and ghosts.
steps: Discover hidden truths in the dungeon.

quests.title: The Last Forgeâ€™s Heart
quests.summary: Restore the heart of the Last Forge to reignite hope.
steps: Find the heart's location in the lair.
quests.success_outcome: The forge blazes anew, granting powerful enhancements.
quests.failure_outcome: The heart breaks, dooming the forge.

quests.title: Moral Fractures
quests.summary: Make a choice affecting the lives of survivors.
steps: Select who receives aid amidst scarcity.
Confront the consequences of your choice.

npcs.name: Raelith the Unbroken
secrets: Carries the weight of betrayal from a lost friend.
Hides a map to the heart of the Last Forge.
hooks: Knows of a way to bridge tragic past and present.

npcs.name: Taran the Fragmented
secrets: Believes the dragon's spirit still lingers.
Once betrayed a friend for survival.
hooks: Sees visions that may lead to the truth.

npcs.name: Elaris the Spirit Keeper
secrets: Hides memories of a past life as a dragon.
hooks: Offers insights that challenge allies' motivations.

npcs.name: Thron the Forgemaster
npcs.personality: Gruff but passionate about his craft
secrets: Once forged weapons for the dragon.
hooks: Can teach companions the ways of rekindling their skills.

creatures.behavior: Roams the remnants of destruction, seeking to unravel reality.
creatures.cr_hint: Beware the void it casts upon allies.

creatures.name: Fractured Dragon
creatures.behavior: A twisted entity born from betrayal, lurking in the abyss.
creatures.cr_hint: Susceptible to the emotions of those nearby.

creatures.name: Spectral Guardian
creatures.behavior: Defends the Last Forge with relentless determination.

creatures.name: Wraith of Trauma
creatures.behavior: Wanders the ruins, seeking to avenge a broken past.
creatures.cr_hint: Vulnerable to light yet feeds on sorrow.
